title: Goals
no_goals_yet_description: Create your first long-term goal to get started on your journey.
my_goals_description: Track your long-term goals with SMART methodology and value vs effort matrix prioritization
tasks_board_description: Manage and organize your tasks in a comprehensive board view
delete_goal_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete this goal? This action cannot be undone and will also delete all associated milestones and tasks.
no_milestones_yet_description: Create your first milestone to break down this goal into manageable steps.
validation_error_must_be_valid_iso_date_: {fieldName} must be a valid ISO date string
validation_error_must_be_valid_year_numb: {fieldName} must be a valid year number between 1900 and 3000
validation_error_must_be_valid_month_num: {fieldName} must be a valid month number between 1 and 12
validation_error_must_be_valid_day_numbe: {fieldName} must be a valid day number between 1 and 31
backup_import_confirmation_message: Replace current data with imported file
backup_import_invalid_file: Please select a valid JSON file.
backup_export_failed_to_export: Failed to export goals. Please try again.
backup_import_modal_message: This will replace all your current goals with the imported data. This action cannot be undone.
backup_import_failed_to_read_file: Failed to read the JSON file. Please ensure it's a valid JSON format.
validation_invalid_url: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., example.com or https://example.com)
no_evidences_yet: No evidences or notes yet. Add some to track your progress.
failed_to_create_goal: Failed to create goal. Please try again.
failed_to_save_goal: Failed to save goal. Please try again.
goal_id_required_for_creating_milestones: Goal ID is required for creating milestones
failed_to_save_milestone: Failed to save milestone. Please try again.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_mileston: Are you sure you want to delete this milestone? This will also delete all associated tasks and cannot be undone.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_ite: Are you sure you want to delete this {itemType}? This action cannot be undone.
milestone_id_required_for_creating_tasks: Milestone ID is required for creating tasks
failed_to_save_task: Failed to save task. Please try again.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_tas: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.
no_tasks_yet: No tasks yet. Create your first task to get started!
backup_hint_message: Your goals are saved locally in your browser. Use this backup option to export your data for use in other browsers or to keep a safe copy for the future.
safety_backup_hint_message: You've made changes to your goals over 24 hours ago. Consider backing up your data for safety.
